com.ikalagaming.packages.rng

Class Generator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.packages.rng.Generator

  • public class Generator
extends java.lang.Object
    A Mersenne twister algorithm for generating random numbers.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Generator(int seed)
      Constructs a new generator and initializes it using the given seed.

    • Method Detail

      • getBoolean

        public boolean getBoolean()
        Returns the next random boolean.
        Returns:
        The next boolean

      • getBoolean

        public boolean getBoolean(float probablilty)
        Generates a boolean with a given probability of being true. The probability is a float from 0.0f to 1.0f, with 0 being no chance of returning true and 1 being a 100% chance of returning true.
        Parameters:
        probablilty - The chance of returning true
        Returns:
        The generated boolean

      • getFloat

        public float getFloat()
        Returns the next random float.
        Returns:

      • getInt

        public int getInt()
        Returns the next random integer.
        Returns:
        The next int

      • getIntBetween

        public int getIntBetween(int min,
                int max)
        Returns a random int between the given values, inclusive.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum number
        max - The maximum number
        Returns:
        The generated int

      • initializeGenerator

        public void initializeGenerator(int seed)
        Initialize the generator with the given seed.
        Parameters:
        seed - The seed to use
